sect2.title: Zend_Application_Resource_Zendmonitor
sect2.para: Zend_Application_Resource_Zendmonitor is a resource that instantiates a Zend_Log instance with an attached Zend_Log_Writer_ZendMonitor writer. It can then be used within your application to log events to Zend Server's event monitor.
It has no configuration parameters; as such, you will simply need to specify it within your configuration. Examples include:
Within your application, you can retrieve the logger from your bootstrap object:

The default project structure generated by the zf.sh or zf.bat commands will configure the resource by default, and adds code into the ErrorController to log application exceptions to the Zend Server event monitor. You can disable this functionality simply by removing the resource configuration from your configuration file.
